# Fin Clips Protocol
[Edit this page](https://github.com/remygatins/GatinsLab/edit/main/field_finclips.qmd)

## Materials
- [ ] Screw top vials
- [ ] 95% ethanol
- [ ] Forceps
- [ ] Scissors

## Protocol
- 1. Fill screw top vials with 95% ethanol.
- 2. Sterilize tools by spraying with ethanol and wiping.
- 3. Cut **(SIZE)** of fin and put in screw top vial.
- 4. Label vial and sterilize tools.
- 5. Store vials **(STORAGE)**
